item.title: Roku Setup
item.description:
Roku Garage Setup

  • IP Address: 192.168.1.70
  • Home Assistant couldn’t auto-discover, so entered IP manually
  • Enabled “Allow control via mobile apps” on Roku settings
  • • Control by mobile apps → Permissive
  • • Device connect → Enabled
